类 org.apache.hadoop.metrics.spi.AbstractMetricsContext
的使用

使用 AbstractMetricsContext 的软件包
org.apache.hadoop.metrics.file Implementation of the metrics package that writes the metrics to a file. 
org.apache.hadoop.metrics.ganglia Implementation of the metrics package that sends metric data to Ganglia. 
org.apache.hadoop.metrics.spi The Service Provider Interface for the Metrics API. 
 

org.apache.hadoop.metrics.file 中 AbstractMetricsContext 的使用
 

org.apache.hadoop.metrics.file 中 AbstractMetricsContext 的子类
 class FileContext
          Metrics context for writing metrics to a file.
 

org.apache.hadoop.metrics.ganglia 中 AbstractMetricsContext 的使用
 

org.apache.hadoop.metrics.ganglia 中 AbstractMetricsContext 的子类
 class GangliaContext
          Context for sending metrics to Ganglia.
 class GangliaContext31
          Context for sending metrics to Ganglia version 3.1.x. 3.1.1 has a slightly different wire portal compared to 3.0.x.
 

org.apache.hadoop.metrics.spi 中 AbstractMetricsContext 的使用
 

org.apache.hadoop.metrics.spi 中 AbstractMetricsContext 的子类
 class CompositeContext
           
 class NoEmitMetricsContext
          A MetricsContext that does not emit data, but, unlike NullContextWithUpdate, does save it for retrieval with getAllRecords().
 class NullContext
          Null metrics context: a metrics context which does nothing.
 class NullContextWithUpdateThread
          A null context which has a thread calling periodically when monitoring is started.
 

参数类型为 AbstractMetricsContext 的 org.apache.hadoop.metrics.spi 中的构造方法
MetricsRecordImpl(String recordName, AbstractMetricsContext context)
          Creates a new instance of FileRecord
